attributes.title: Don’t get it
attributes.review: I highly recommend you to not get the app it’s terrible and so is the President 💯.

attributes.title: Where’s my dog?
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app, my dog got scared of the orange🍊thing that popped up and ran away😭I never saw my doggo again😩Bad App!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review:
This app only showcases the disappointing, disgusting man who is the “president” of this country(if you choose to call him that)
He is racist, homophobic, sexist pig and anything supporting him NEEDS TO BE REMOVED IMMEDIATELY!!!!!

attributes.title: This man ate my son
attributes.review: Highly disappointed. This was a waste of space on my phone

attributes.title: Why?
attributes.review:
Why is our President so divisive and partisan?

Why have Republican representatives that I once respected allowed our President to make a mockery of their party?

Why can’t our President be kind and care about people of all color, religion, and ethnic background?

Why do we as an electorate accept this?

attributes.title: 😭✨🧚‍♀️✌️
attributes.review: so i got the app to help America. but when i open the app i saw....😭 some human Cheeto thing and my grandpa that was behind me saw too. now his in a coma 😭😭😭✨🧚‍♀️🧃

attributes.title: Waste of brain cells
attributes.review: Honestly horrible....Wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy unless they were stupid🥰
Umm all I saw was a Cheeto looking man and some words. I didn’t bother to read them cause looking at his face was torture enough

attributes.title: What is going on!?
attributes.review: I came here for good trump announcements and just got flooded with viruses. They tapped my phone and now it glitches!

attributes.title: Horribleeeee!
attributes.review: Its just horrible and I know for a fact your not gonna like it either.😌🤢
